data.description: Peek into the internals of a running POE env
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
POE::API::Peek extends the POE::Kernel interface to provide clean
    access to Kernel internals in a cross-version compatible manner.
    Other calculated data is also available.

    My intention is to provide massive amounts of internal data for use
    in POE debugging.
